title: LinkedIn data crawling of specific people
snippet:
I need a crawler for getting education and work experience data of certain people. 

I have their names, positions and company. Need to find LinkedIn profiles, and need someone to find/identify them on LinkedIn and crawl their profile data including years worked, companies worked for, degrees, years, field of study etc. More specific directions to follow. 

Please have data entry experience of manually/programmed finding or matching of people to their LinkedIn profiles, or have crawler experience to get the education and prior experience data.
